data.actual_result: The letter in the top line is to the right of the letter in the bottom line
data.expected_result: Letters are in the same position in each line
data.short_description: Making a double line markdown using a single apostrophe puts text at different starting positions
data.steps_to_repro: - Type a double line markdown using a single apostrophe and a single letter on each line - Put the markdown apostrophe and one letter on the first line, and the same letter and the ending markdown apostrophe on the second line - Send your message and observe the positions of the letters
